nl: Let $X$ be a metric space in which every infinite subset has a limit point. Prove that $X$ is separable.
lean:
∀ {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X]
  (hX : ∀ (A : Set X), Infinite A → ∃ (x : X), x ∈ closure A), SeparableSpace X
candidate: ∀ {X : Type*} [MetricSpace X] (h : ∀ (S : Set X) (hS : S.Infinite), ∃ (x : X), x ∈ closure S), SeparableSpace X
imports:
import Mathlib

open Topology Filter Real Complex TopologicalSpace Finset
open scoped BigOperators
